sources.title: Great Commandment, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Great Commandment (1939) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: John Beal, Maurice Moscovitch, Albert Dekker 
Director: Irving Pichel

Portrays the conversion to Christianity of a young Zealot and a Roman soldier through the teachings of Jesus in his Parable of the Good Samaritan.

metadata.Plot: The Great Commandment is a Christian film directed by Irving Pichel, which portrays the conversion to Christianity of a young Zealot, Joel, and the Roman soldier Longinus through the teachings of Jesus in his Parable of the Good Samaritan. It was co-produced by Rev. James K. Friedrich and released by Cathedral Films in 1939. Its theatrical release was in 1941 by Twentieth Century Fox.
metadata.Actors: John Beal, Maurice Moscovitch, Albert Dekker
